text: Federal Center of Technological Education Celso Suckow da Fonseca (Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica Celso Suckow da Fonseca, short Cefet-RJ) is a public university of the Brazilian state of Rio de Janeiro.Eleições para Direção-Geral do CEFET/RJ: DEBATE COM OS CANDIDATOS , portal Cefet/RJ, publicado em 4 de abril de 2011. Established in 1909, it is the second largest university in Rio de Janeiro as well as one the country's best universities. ==Related pages== *Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica de Minas Gerais ==References== ==Other websites== *Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica Celso Suckow da Fonseca Category:Colleges and universities in Brazil Category:Buildings and structures in Rio de Janeiro Category:1909 establishments in Brazil Category:Organizations based in Rio de Janeiro
title: Federal Center for Technological Education of Rio de Janeiro
